email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 15,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you provide a quote and confirm vessel availability for a laycan of October 10-15?

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN HORIZON, DWT 45,000, LOA 200m, for your shipment. The initial freight quote is USD 25 per metric ton. The vessel is currently in Singapore and can be positioned to Newcastle for your requested laycan.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang
Cargo Transport Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate of USD 25 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you review and possibly offer a more competitive rate? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering the current market, we can offer a revised rate of USD 23 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is USD 8,000 per day, pro rata, and the loading window is 48 hours.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The revised rate of USD 23 per metric ton is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for the MV OCEAN HORIZON with a laycan of October 10-15. Kindly send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your confirmation. Attached is the charter party for your review. Please let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as agreed. Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
